headline: Potential Stripe Deal Puts PayPal Valuation And Future Direction In Focus
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) is reportedly in early-stage acquisition talks after a substantial drop in its valuation and significant executive turnover. Stripe is said to be exploring a potential purchase of all or parts of PayPal, which signals rising interest from a large peer in the digital payments space. These discussions come as PayPal continues to work through operational challenges and management changes that have drawn close investor attention. PayPal operates one of the...

headline: Buy Now Pay Later Platforms Market Report 2026, Profiles of Afterpay, Klarna, Affirm, Zip, Sezzle, PayPal, Splitit, Perpay, Navalo, FuturePay - Trends, Opportunities, and Forecasts to 2031
summary: The Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) market capitalizes on the rapid growth of digital commerce and the preference of Millennials and Gen Z for flexible payment options. Opportunities lie in expanding BNPL into high-value sectors like travel and integrating installment features into physical payment cards, countering regulatory challenges.
